email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s ($50.50 per metric ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you come down to the mid-40s? Also, what’s the laycan for this shipment? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After some discussion, we can offer $48.75 per metric ton. The laycan is October 20-25. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.75 sounds more reasonable. However, we’d like to lock in a laycan of October 18-22 if possible. Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and we can adjust the laycan to October 18-22. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you, and we can proceed with the fixture. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the adjustments. We’re good to proceed at $48.75 per metric ton with the laycan of October 18-22 and demurrage at $20,000 per day. Please send over the fixture recap for review. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, as discussed, here’s the fixture recap: Vessel: MV Ocean Star, DWT: 150,000, LOA: 280m. Cargo: Crude Oil, 140,000 MT. Load Port: Houston. Discharge Port: Rotterdam. Freight Rate: $48.75/MT. Laycan: October 18-22. Demurrage: $20,000/day. Please confirm if everything looks correct. Best, Sarah
